My name is Marty.
I enjoy helping people & keeping things simple.

About Me

I am a experienced developer that works for Baltimore County Government. I help make our stuff better.

In my free time, I enjoy playing pretty much anything and hanging out with family, friends and my dogs. I'm always happy when I stumble into a good meal accompanied by adult beverage or two.
